course_title: Text Media in Premodern East Asia
course_description: This course aims to explore how textual media operated in East Asia (China, Korea, and Japan) as a lens to understand the history and culture of the region from a fresh perspective.
sections: Class Nbr: 5542, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: H. Cho, Status: Open
